name: Muzketeerz
description:
Muzketeers, is an action-strategy game of trying to hold with a square of musketeers/riflemen against hordes of zombies.

CONTROLS:

Left-click to move the soldiers in a square formation.

MAKING A LINE: To make a line you first have to press the middle mouse button (scroll wheel button) on the point you want to move and then left-click in the direction you want to form the line. 8 directions are avaible.

FIRING: For firing, press right-click while in a line.

To pause just press the Esc key.

Made by hmph. and Shulky.

CHANGELOG FOR THE BUG FIXED VERSION

  1. Fixed difficulty by removing musketeer spawning. (It also caused some bugs)
  2. Fixed zombie spawning areas (They now spawn west and south as well, forgot to add the values for that or the script didn’t save)
